text: 2.7: 1 Ko 2.3; 2 Ko 13.4; 2 T 2.24Khueŋ guigira, nza Krais nzan farasarigim, nza ana ŋaara gumgi ki. Nza maaŋ muuŋgi vuzvuk kake, nza warir kurkurar zav simtɨgen nde ndɨɨe. Nza nde phorga ki tugen, nza mbarara nde phorga kav, mbarara nde phorga ŋgari. Nza mbik tan won tara ndɨɨi fara muuŋgiap kegi.
